=== NEWS ARTICLE ===
Title: PM Office directs Coal India to list all subsidiaries by 2030
Source: Economic Times - Markets
Published: 2025-12-28 05:26
Related Stocks: General Market News
Categories: markets

Summary:
To improve governance and accountability, the Prime Minister's Office (PMO) has directed the coal ministry to map and list all the subsidiaries of state-run CIL by 2030, sources said.

Sentiment: neutral
URL: https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/markets/ipos/fpos/pm-office-directs-coal-india-to-list-all-subsidiaries-by-2030/articleshow/126212513.cms
